text: Kristján B. Jónasson is an Icelandic book publisher at Crymogea Publishing and the former head of the Association of Icelandic Book Publishers.Reyljavik Tourism site Publishing Perspectives He has written on Sigurður Nordal.The Árni Magnússon Institute for Icelandic Studies == References == Category:Living people Category:Icelandic publishers (people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Kristján B. Jónasson
